attributes.action: Take the UK out of the UN Global Migration Compact, or hold a referendum on it
attributes.additional_details:
URL on pact: https://refugeesmigrants.un.org/migration-compact

Austria pulls out of pact stating 'migration is not a human right': https://youtu.be/Nwfn8C9NA28

Detailed video on pact: https://youtu.be/5WRszRZBfYw

Why was there no coverage in media?

https://uk.reuters.com/article/uk-serco-group-contract/serco-mears-win-2-9-billion-refugee-housing-contracts-in-britain-idUKKCN1P216Z - Why is the gov spending 2.9 billion on housing for 'refugees' when there is a housing crisis for citizens?
attributes.background:
The compact if implemented lays down framework which is not in the national interest, it goes against freedom of speech, freedom of the press and makes all migration a human right. 

The government ignored the previous petition to debate signing it, which gained 130,297 signatures. Here's round 2.
